title: Vivienne Westwood and Stella McCartney Photographed at Work

organizations.name: arizona governor shares details of sex life on campaign website noah

text:
View Slideshow Vivienne Westwood. photographed in her studio. Photo: Gautier Deblonde Yesterday marked the end of London Fashion Week , which inspired sparkling, Beyoncé-approved jumpsuits and intricately embroidered Burberry capes . The new photography book London Uprising: Fifty Fashion Designers, One City goes behind the scenes with 50 London-based designers, offering a rare glimpse of the fashion industry at work.
The collection profiles a variety of labels, from independent designers like Simone Rocha and Erdem Moralioglu to larger brands like Stella McCartney and Alexander McQueen . Each chapter features one designer with a portrait, interview, and detailed look inside the studio, tracing the design process from sketches to dress forms. Click ahead to see Vivienne Westwood , Manolo Blahnik, Jonathan Anderson , and more London designers at work.
